Birmanie: karen millen sale demonstration against power cuts

http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comsaffron "in 2007 - have demonstrated Sunday against power cuts in Mandalay, Burma's second city, residents said on Monday. A new gathering was planned Monday night,karen millen dressesafter three months of organized blackouts that have left the city with sometimes only four hours of electricity a day.

The new government, which replaced the junta in March 2011 and has since stepped up political reforms, approved a few months ago a law legalizing demonstrations.karen millen saleIt states that the protesters must inform the authorities five days in advance of the place and purpose of the gathering,karen millen outletor risk a year in prison.

The protesters in Mandalay, who mobilized through the Internet, have not respected the rules, but police still did not disperse their gathering, residents said. "Everyone lit candles and market, said a participant, cartoonist known as Hercules. They are not members of a political party [...]. There is no leader."

THE DEPUTY MINISTER OF ELECTRICITY TO MANDALAY

Demonstrations are rare in Burma, karen millen sale the last major parade is from 2007. The saffron revolt, led by Buddhist monks, had attracted 100 000 people in the streets of Rangoon, constituting the most serious challenge to the generals since the popular uprising in 1988. Both movements were violently repressed.

In Mandalay, where power outages are getting longer in recent months, karen millen outlet some residents accuse the government to sell the electricity produced in Burma's powerful neighbor China at the expense of its population. A Burmese official, on condition of anonymity, simply stated that the Ministry of Electricity was "busy with the question of this event", adding that the deputy minister arrived in Mandalay. The official press had on his side on Sunday accused the rebels of the Kachin ethnic minority to have destroyed a tower of a power line in northern Shan State, karen millen dresses disrupting even more power.

Abstention massive protest vote karen millen outlet in the m

The second round of municipal elections in 120 municipalities test was marked by Monday,karen millen saleMay 21 massive abstention and a breakthrough of the protest movement "Cinque Stelle" great destroyer of the traditional parties.

Four million voters were called on Sunday http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comand Monday to vote for these partial municipal, which concerned only about 120 municipalities 8000 but gave an indication of the prevailing mood, a year of elections and while Italy is in a deep economic slump. The voting took place in a country traumatized by the earthquake that killed at least six people Saturday and a terrible attack against a school,karen millen outletalmost simultaneous, who killed a schoolgirl 16 years.

Discredited traditional parties

At 18 hours,karen millen dressesthe turnout was only 51.4%, or 14 points lower in the first round (65.4%). Bad weather and fear to vote in the northeast of Italy hit by the earthquake may have played in mass abstention. But the demobilization of part of the electorate, particularly in the center right, big loser in the first round, was noted by analysts.

The big surprise of this second round victory karen millen outlet in the great bourgeois city of Parma a candidate of "Cinque Stelle" (five stars), Federico Pizzarotti. It received 60.2% of the vote against the candidate of the center left, Vincenzo Bernazzoli, after the counting of ballots in all 203 polling stations.

The party leader, Beppe Grillo, himself explains the success of his movement by the discrediting of traditional parties and the rise of the Internet. His movement has also won two other small towns, Comacchio and Mira.

FAILING THE LDP AND NORTHERN LEAGUE

The Democratic Party (PD), karen millen dresses the main movement of the left, has still performed well, notably in Genoa, where his candidate received 59.7%, according to final figures. In Palermo, Leoluca Orlando, spokesman for the Italy of Values ??(left) and considered a champion of the anti-mafia, won with 72.4% against Fabrizio Ferrandelli, PD candidate, according to final figures.

In the first round on 940 Commons, the People of Freedom (PDL) of Silvio Berlusconi, the main party to the legislation of 2008 (37%), found himself excluded in several cities, starting with the largest population of this ballot, Palermo.

The Northern League, karen millen sale a former key ally of Berlusconi, meanwhile recorded in the first round of humiliating setbacks in some strongholds of the North because of a scandal involving the use of subsidies election.

Valls not tolerate "so-called theologians" karen

The interior minister,karen millen saleManuel Valls, said Monday, May 21 he would not accept the presence in the territory of "so-called theologians" preaching "hatred of the Jew," at the annual dinner of the Representative Council Jewish Institutions in France (CRIF) http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comfrom Marseille-Provence.

"As interior minister, I will not accept that come on our soil so-called preachers, so-called theologians who advocate, whether with harsh words or sweet words,karen millen dresseshatred of the Jew "said the minister, who was in Marseille Monday its first outing in the provinces.

Referring to "organizations" that invite,karen millen outlet"it is time they change their attitude and respect the laws of the Republic," added Mr. Valls.

"THE FRENCH DO Muslim should not be stigmatized"

Welcoming the President of the French Muslim Council, Mohammed Moussaoui, in the room, karen millen outlet as a "man of wisdom and dialogue", the minister invited him to firmness in this respect.

The president of CRIF Marseille-Provence, Michele Teboul, had previously respected the audience a moment of silence for the victims of killings in Toulouse and Montauban.

"When a Jew is attacked in France, karen millen sale it is the Republic itself was under attack. Any aggression against a religion is a serious offense against the Republic and its values," said Minister from the inside, adding: "In the Republic, everyone must have its place, the French Muslim should not be stigmatized, they are France and enrich it."

Marseille came to "assert [its] commitment to the fight against crime", without making announcements, Mr. Valls met with police and local authorities. He also traveled in the northern suburbs before a high school near where a shooting left one person dead and one wounded on May 11

The minister had to go back to Marseille on Tuesday morning, karen millen dresses after a final visit to the General Staff Interdepartmental area Valabre in Gardanne (Bouches-du-Rhone).

La South Korea is preparing karen millen dresses to buy hund

South Korea plans to spend 1.68 billion karen millen outleteuros over the next five years to buy hundreds of missile threats from North Korea revealed Tuesday, May 22 the South Korean press.

According to the Chosun Ilbo newspaper and Yonhap,karen millen salethe South Korean President Lee Myung-bak, has approved the proposal of the Ministry of Defence, for the purchase of 500 to 600 new missiles to 2,500 billion won (1 , 68 billion euros) at a ministerial meeting on April 28. The authorities did not wish to confirm this information,http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.commerely to state that South Korea "agreed on the need to strengthen" its missile armament.

The Department filed its request "due to increasing threats of provocation from the North since (the new leader) Kim Jong-un came to power,"karen millen dressessaid the Chosun Ilbo, quoting government sources. Kim Jong-one succeeded his father as head of North Korea in mid-December, when the latter died. In recent weeks, Pyongyang has repeatedly threatened Seoul "a holy war" in your diatribes to increasingly virulent.

A MISSILE RANGE OF 1500 KM

The United States and karen millen dresses its allies suspect Pyongyang to attempt a nuclear test, following the failure of its rocket launch on April 13. This initiative was denounced by Westerners as a disguised test of long-range missile. But the rocket exploded shortly after takeoff.

According to the Chosun Ilbo, Seoul wants to increase its number of Hyunmu-3, new cruise missile with a range of 1500 km, karen millen outlet and its ballistic missiles, Hyunmu-2, a range of 300 km. These weapons can reach nuclear facilities, missile bases, the biochemical weapons sites and air bases and command side of North Korea, added the newspaper.

According to the South Korean army, the North has a thousand missiles: 800 Scud missiles capable of hitting targets in South Korea or Japan, karen millen sale and 200 Rodong-1 capable of reaching Tokyo.

Accord within the EU to fund karen millen outlet major proje

http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comThe European Union will be able to release a budget of 230 million euros from its budget to encourage private capital to invest in strategic infrastructure projects, announced Tuesday, May 22 the Danish Presidency of the EU.

An agreement was reached between European governments and the European Parliament to start this operation,karen millen outletconsidered the pilot phase of the bond financing of the European project, called "Project Bond Initiative". The "Bond" is considered an important instrument to stimulate the economy and employment in Europe.karen millen dressesEU leaders are to discuss in Brussels on Wednesday evening at their informal summit.

TRANS-EUROPEAN INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS

The multiplier effect of these funds should provide up to 4.5 billion euros,karen millen salesaid the Commission. The idea is to raise capital from pension funds, insurance companies and other private investors.

The 230 million from unused EU funds in the EU budget in 2012, karen millen outlet and the line of credit allocated to the trans-European networks and program funds for competitiveness, said a spokesman for the Commission.

The agreement must still be approved by member states in May and by a vote in the European Parliament in July. This pilot phase is scheduled for the period 2012-2013 and is expected to launch five or six infrastructure projects in the trans-European transport, energy and communications.

"230 MILLION, THIS IS RIDICULOUS"

Some MEPs deplored the timidity of the initiative: "What is on the table is 230 million euros, karen millen sale this is ridiculous. The major battle in the Council right now is between those who want this instrument be used once and those who want them to be several times. This is inadequate and ridiculous. Not with 230 million that will change anything. must be substantial amounts, it is called 1 000 billion, "said the leader of the Liberals in Parliament, Guy Verhofstadt, at the press briefing of its group.

The Swedish Social Democratic Färm, Parliament's rapporteur for this initiative has however welcomed the agreement reached Tuesday, while insisting also on the "weakness" of the amount karen millen dresses provided as collateral by the EU. "This is an amount small, but that goes in the direction of the growth strategy that many are asking, he said at a press briefing at Parliament. If projects do not work, we will not lose large much. "

Cendres impasses karen millen outlet and Lebanese

http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comHow to fight against the savagery? It is the quest that continues a test, rather a survival manual, written by journalist and former Lebanese MP Samir Franjieh. Its author has securities to enforce after fifteen years immersed in the furnace of civil war and another fifteen years under the iron grip of the Pax Syriana,karen millen dressesat a time, one might say, the Lebanese do s' not always liked.

Journey to the End of the violence he describes, he has taken the route in a committed,karen millen salesometimes actor and yet lucid proactive, struck by a constantly renewed amazement at the vision of a country rocker ever deeper into barbarism, when he appeared in the late 1960s as the leading intellectual and economic of the Middle East.

The roots of violence are not always what you think.karen millen outletSamir Franjieh is convinced. If the explosion occurs marquetry Community in 1975, it is not as differences that permeate the Lebanese people, Shia, Sunni or Christian overnight become unbearable, but rather because a deliberate policy of modernization , after a first warning in 1958, had contributed to lifting people out of closed societies in which violence was strictly codified.

In Beirut, karen millen outlet the seedbed of a quest for identity, the interplay of regional influences found to flourish: Islamo-progressives against pro-Palestinian Christians sensitive to the alliance of minorities promoted since the creation of their state by Israeli leaders eager to see emerge alongside them a mythical Mount Lebanon Maronite.

After the fiasco of "Operation Peace for Galilee", the plan will be relayed by the Israeli ambitions pansyriennes of Hafez al-Assad after the exhaustion of all stakeholders militia, which revived the ranking between anti and karen millen sale pro-Syrian. The terrible teaching laboratory Lebanese wars interchiites in inter-Christian wars, however, show the limits of convenient explanation of the horror the only external factor.

PARADOX OF HISTORY

These three decades of dead ends and ash float two camps, according to Samir Franjieh. He who has made it a quest for the perfect life together, and that - it is the vision of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah - who favors the group over the individual and made Lebanon a country of frontline , permanently oscillating between hot and cold peace peace.

Because of its recent history, the Cedar country has value matrix Eastern policy, and the change under way since the beginning of "Arab spring" here and there in duplicate some aspects.

Diving into the depths, karen millen dresses splits community is now in Syria after Iraq, which began another journey into violence. In an ironic paradox of history is in Lebanese history that his former political godfather will probably read her this before hope for a future.

Seul a Paris-Rome karen millen dresses can move Merkel

Francis Holland will play a key role in avoiding a collapse of the euro area.karen millen saleTo achieve a successful outcome of the crisis, Francois Hollande needs three things: give up its desire to renegotiate the pact European tax (TSCG), forge a political alliance with Mario Monti,karen millen outletinitiate proposals for growth and social equity more ambitious.

The European situation is dramatic. Nothing seems to stop the debt crisis, public and private, between the political upheaval in Greece and the discovery of the extent of banking sector problems.http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comEuropean banks troubled countries have used the liquidity of the ECB to buy sovereign debt. If it has temporarily relieved the market of government securities, the collateral effect was to tie the fate of more states than their banks. The Spanish banking sector, which gave a vengeance, financing a speculative bubble in real estate, shows € 184 billion of bad loans in real estate sector alone. Gorging these banks for government securities while the Spanish state itself is very delicate amounts to make it even more suspicious investors of all that is Spanish.karen millen dressesMeanwhile across Europe are trying to correct deficits, certainly aggravated by the economic downturn, but created by years of mismanagement. Austerity and created widespread unemployment, causes of bankruptcies. Waves of suicides are reported in Southern Europe, while anxiety invades millions of people, unable to survive with dignity, losing confidence in their abilities. Yet it is not denying the TSCG that the eurozone will survive. On the one hand this is unacceptable for Germany, the first donor. Moreover, it is ineffective, most rules of the Treaty is already in effect since December 2011 and the vote of the European regulations "six-pack".

However, blindly pursue the austerity, karen millen dresses or continue to inject public money into banks, would be socially and politically suicidal. The banking issue of 2007, and nothing has changed. Inject capital directly into the banking sector as proposed by some would stop the suspect, to restart the credit on a sound basis and therefore the economy. But this path would be politically suicidal for the EU. We should explain to taxpayers and why we continue to pay hundreds of billions to rescue banks while billions that could avoid extreme poverty to millions of people are never found in the folds of public spending.

President Francois Hollande is betting on an economic recovery through investments. But the four points of the memorandum does not create enough nor fast enough growth. On the other hand the conception of "growth" is not the same in Paris,karen millen outlet or Rome, Berlin, London, where it does mean liberalization of the labor market and the services sector.

This is why we must act differently. Angela Merkel and Mario Monti negotiate simultaneous ratification of TSCG. This may partly isolate Francois Hollande on the European stage while France and Italy share the same interest at the moment (as in Spain for that matter). Francois Hollande should support the proposal by Mario Monti, which is that of calculating deficits differently. The TSCG talks about structural deficit that must be limited to 0.5% of GDP. But future investments generating growth can not be regarded as tax breaks under the structural deficit. If such a proposal was needed, we would gain a considerable leeway.

Moreover, Germany is now benefiting from interest rates below inflation and near zero through the crisis, after being the first recipient of the common market. This distortion must be corrected by the pooling of a portion of the debt of member states, transferring at European level. It would be much more acceptable to Berlin for an inflationary policy the ECB, real taboo psychological Berlin. Also create inflation, affect less affluent populations. Once settled the issue of public debt should clean the balance sheets of the banking sector. The European Solidarity Mechanism (SPM) may well have to be used to recapitalize banks.

But instead of lending to banks, karen millen sale the EU should impose the abandonment of interest on bad loans of small businesses or citizens who have lost a job or being on the brink of bankruptcy. MES could guarantee the capital, and reschedule payments of citizens in difficulty. This cleanse bank balance sheets, and give a breath of fresh air to the poor. For once, give the image of an EU that helps people rather than banks. Symbols count in politics, Francois Hollande knows.

La death penalty sought against Ben Ali karen millen sale be

The prosecutor of the military court of El Kef in northwestern Tunisia,karen millen outletWednesday, May 23 has required the death penalty against former Tunisian President Zine el-Abidine Ben Ali, tried in absentia for aiding and abetting voluntary manslaughter in the repression in the January 2011 popular uprising,http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comit was learned judicial source military.

The prosecutor demanded the death penalty for the former president and "the toughest sanctions possible" for his twenty-two co-defendants,karen millen dressesformer senior regime officials, prosecuted for the deaths of at least 22 people in Thala and Kasserine, in central-western region.karen millen saleBoth cities have paid a heavy price in the popular uprising that caused the leak in Saudi Arabia Ben Ali January 14, 2011.

This is the first time that the death penalty is sought against the karen millen sale former Tunisian President, who is the subject of dozens of legal proceedings before the justices military and civilian. Ben Ali has already accumulated a civil convictions sixty-six years in prison including embezzlement, drug trafficking and abuse of public property. It is the subject with his wife Leila Trabelsi an international arrest warrant, but Saudi Arabia has not so far responded to requests for extradition Tunisian.

WONDER OF LAWYERS

During the trial of Kef, begun in late November 2011, none of the defendants admitted having given the order to fire, each referring to the responsibility a "safe cell monitoring" and "operating room" of the Ministry from within, without mentioning names. Among the indicted are the former interior ministers Rafik Belhaj Kacem and Friaâ Ahmed and former Director General of Security, Adel Tiouiri, karen millen dresses and the former head of special brigades, Jalel Boudriga. The pleadings of the defense must continue Thursday.

Former Prime Minister of Tunisia, Mohamed Ghannouchi, who led the first government post-Ben Ali, however, had testified in court in January of Kef and blamed the ousted president. He specifically assured calling Ben Ali on January 9, asking him to stop firing live ammunition against the population at Kasserine. Ben Ali would have justified the use of weapons as a "self defense".

The prosecution case were met with astonishment by several lawyers, including the plaintiff. "Ben Ali is not the main actor of the killings, he is charged with complicity and yet the prosecutor against him requires a little more important than against those prosecuted for homicide," said Abderraouf Ayadi, a defender families of victims.

"I think justice is trying to find a compromise with the families of martyrs rather than making a fair trial, there is no desire to know the real culprits," he lamented. For its part, Oueslati Othman, karen millen outlet a lawyer for another defendant, Rafik Belhaj Kacem, said his client had "never received instructions to kill Ben Ali". "This case does not fit on the substance and form," he said, quoted by TAP. The pleadings of the defense must continue for several more days.

Restructuration debt and karen millen sale the Marshall Plan

Summing them to determine their destiny within now reduced to three weeks,karen millen dressesthe Greek case calls loudly leaders Eurol area: in the best case, they have until after the June 17 date for parliamentary elections in greece. We will then know whether the Greeks themselves confirm their adherence to austerity plan by the choice of political parties on this project. Anything by then no guarantee that investors Greek banking panic does not precipitate out of Greece under a scenario that has already a name in the markets: "Grexit".http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comWith which a specific threat hitherto remained in the background: that an outflow of Greece does not cause a collapse of the euro area.

The economic, political and social in Greece but also its financial position is much worse than before the implementation of the rescue plan that has been working since mid-2011 the leaders of the eurozone,karen millen outletthe European Central Bank (EC and the International Monetary Fund (IMF). The overall debt of Greece has become higher than it was before the release of the first tranche of early 2012: indebted to a creditor lend at rates higher than its initial debt, when economic growth is zero or negative and the low level of inflation, can only worsen its debt.karen millen saleThis plan is vital to avoid an uncontrolled failure of Greece, momentarily reassured all partners of the euro area. But he allowed only to save time.

It is unfortunate that the rulers did not use this grace period, karen millen sale from late 2011 to March 2012, to place the center of the debate the real issue, the risk of bursting of the euro area, rather than leave imposed by the timing drift of the Greek situation. This scenario would start with the output of Greece. Already the Greek banking system has seen its deposits melt a third in two years (240 billion euros in early 2010 to 170 in the first quarter 2012), and this situation has recently accelerated. If the beginning of Greek investors' concern has not yet affected other European investors, we observe that the major European groups have started to withdraw deposits from banks and 'peripheral' countries. This is a crisis in its banking system that the eurozone could well explode.

In the next three weeks, we must first solve the financial problem Greek: Greek debt, 375 billion, much of which is due to the creditors of the euro area, is insignificant amounts in terms of macroeconomic area and suffers daily losses that all of its scholarships for several weeks. To avoid the exit of Greece before or after June 17, there is no other way that a new plan to restructure its overall debt, which includes not only that of the Greek state, but also Overall household debt and Greek companies. It will make further write-offs, karen millen dresses that is to say, the destruction of debt, so money, and thus capital. Added to this is a remaining balance spread over several decades. The losses will be borne by the taxpayers of Europe, European banks and other investors, international banks. By itself, such a restructuring will not be enough, unless we add the equivalent of a Marshall Plan for Greece. We must then immediately take up the case of Spain first, then Portugal and Ireland, even more threatening to the survival of the euro area. Avoiding procrastination same as on Greece: the longer you wait, the greater the losses will be large.

With Greece, it was to prevent the loss initially anticipated worsening admitting at the outset that she could never repay, loaded with abyssal deficits discovered too late by its partners, and growth of Suffering negatively proportional to the austerity plan applied to it. Not having sufficient time accepted this evidence, the euro area has worsened the loss potential of this country. Europe must now cope in an emergency, to issue a more worrying: the contagion, the vector of a Spanish banking crisis, then Portuguese and Irish. To avoid this, we must quickly consider a bold plan to restructure the debt of these countries. This is a purely political decision. Without such an approach, karen millen outlet the breakup of the euro area becomes an inevitable scenario, including the financial consequences would far exceed the amount of debt the only Greek.

Catherine Gerst, before joining in 2008, Citigate Dewe Rogerson financial communications firm has been CEO of Moody's France.

http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comThe minister of labor, employment and social dialogue Michel Sapin found Thursday, May 24 "legitimate" to give a boost to the minimum wage but rejected the idea of ??a sharp increase as requested by some unions.

"When you're a cashier at 70% of the minimum wage,karen millen saleyou can not live, it is legitimate to give a boost to minimum wage," said Michel Sapin on Canal +.

Then qualified:karen millen dresses"But when you're a small company with order books hard, you ask yourself the question of the balance of your account, and then we can not do jumps on the minimum wage is it must be reconciled and a decision will be made, "added the Minister, by insisting on dialogue with social partners.karen millen outlet"There is no right decision if there is no dialogue preceding this decision," he said.

The boost to the minimum wage is one of the campaign pledges of Francois Hollande. During the debate between the two rounds, he had promised: "The minimum wage will be indexed not only on price but on a share of growth. Whenever growth will rise, karen millen dresses the minimum wage will be adjusted. The blow inch on the minimum wage will be based on growth. "

TWO UNIONS CALL A SHARP RISE

This boost the minimum wage is one of the social topics of the conference to be held before mid-July, two unions demanded a major effort: karen millen outlet an increase of 300 euros gross for the CGT in 1700 euro gross per month, while the FO calls for gradual increase to 1,340 euros against net approximately 1100 euros net today.

Invited to say whether the government would accede to the claim of Jean-Claude Mailly, a number of FO, the minister replied: "He knows himself."

On unemployment, another key theme of the conference social, Michel Sapin warned against "social plans that lie ahead." "They were under the carpet and emerge from under the carpet" by questioning "the previous state shareholder" in the situation of Air France, karen millen sale according to the press that could remove 5,000 jobs within three years.

La daughter of karen millen dresses Raul Castro supports Oba

"If I were American I would vote for Obama",karen millen outletlaunched in San Francisco, the daughter of Cuban President Raul Castro, praising his support for gay marriage and the easing of travel restrictions for Cubans to the United States .

Mariela Castro,karen millen salea sexologist who stands over ten years by his fight tirelessly for gay rights in Cuba, long persecuted by the regime of his uncle, Fidel,http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comarrived this week in San Francisco to attend a conference on homosexuals in Latin America.

"I think he is sincere,karen millen dressesit's something in what he really believes," she said about President Barack Obama and gay marriage, in his first public appearance after his arrival.

She lamented, karen millen dresses referring to Cuban exiles in the United States, a "small group of offenders" continues to prevent the warming of relations between Washington and Havana.

ANGER OF ANTI-Castro

The United States generally refuse to grant visas to Cuban officials who ask to go there for professional reasons. Issuance of the visa has angered anti-Castro U.S. Congressmen, like Robert Menendez, who considers the decision "illegal" because it violates a U.S. Presidential Executive Order that prohibits access to U.S. territory to members the Cuban Communist Party.

For his part, David Rivera, karen millen outlet a politician from Florida, a place of exile Cuban Mariela was held that "a strong supporter of tyrannical rule of his father and uncle," Fidel Castro. Mitt Romney has also stepped into the breach to denounce it "wishes to welcome the daughter of a dictator".

"In cases like this, our policy of granting visas is independent of political, economic and those relating to human rights we have with any country. We comply with U.S. laws" , said Victoria Nuland, spokesman for the Department of State.

Travel restrictions to Cuba and the academic and cultural exchanges have been eased by President Barack Obama, karen millen sale and in 2011 nearly 400,000 Cuban-Americans were able to go on vacation in Cuba.

La new karen millen dresses modesty

Periods of political change have in common karen millen salewith the fashion shows that require us to look at politics and its players with a fresh eye. Which usually would not consider our attention - the baldness of it, the jeans of this, the calibration always amazing sizes on the picture of the cabinet - is enhanced in the scale of our curiosities by the magic of beginnings. The newly elected throng the forefront with clumsiness, tripping on the red carpet, make learning difficult protocol.karen millen outletNew faces are appearing. Some even cry. Their excitement sometimes leads them to confuse their personal biography and the great book of history but we are grateful to be the messengers of the new in this world. All in all, we prefer the innocence of infancy misleading to disappointment for a warrant.

THE FIRST STEPS OF FRANCIS HOLLAND did not escape the rule.http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comWe saw himself into the arms of the crowd like a child starts to conquer the waves and that it is hard to return, wet, on the shore. Then they learned that he had flown twice to Berlin, having suffered lightning. It was discovered on his arrival, stumbling a little on the red carpet and lingering before a row of soldiers before being led by Angela Merkel stiff as a cheerleader ...karen millen dressesIn Washington, Barack Obama hosted the freshman G8 with gaiety and multiplied the valves on the cheeseburgers Chicago, use the scooter in Paris and the dress code in use at Camp David. He even present it as his translator to the French press. Holland was not to be outdone and replied with humor the jokes of its predecessor: "Already the duo was unanimous," hastened to say the site Pure People, subject matter expert.

Barack Obama and Francois Hollande have more than one reason to agree, karen millen dresses both advocate a return to growth and are supporters of Keynesian stimulus policies after decades of orthodox neoliberalism. Both have campaigned for the withdrawal of troops in Iraq and Afghanistan, costly relics of the Bush-Blair. If Francois Hollande has not generated the same fervor in 2012 Obama in 2008, the crisis has dampened the euphoria meantime voters, both carried the same message of reconciliation and healing ahead of countries divided by policies of their predecessors fracture. Finally, by focusing on state action in favor of education and health, their campaigns have brought to the forefront the desire for more equality and solidarity, while their opponents insist more on individual performance and meritocracy.

"It's like a spring cleaning - both moral and physical ... It's the end of bling and stars covered in rhinestones on the red carpet. I call it the new modesty." Karl Lagerfeld in 2009, karen millen outlet and analyzed for The New York Times the new mood of fashion and luxury industry after the 2008 crisis. Presenting the Chanel collection, he claimed to have looked for "a graphic interpretation, linear, sharp and clear air time". Result: a collection of extreme sobriety where everything from embroidery to decorations, was white paper. The collection was called "white page". At the same time, François Holland launched his campaign at a rally in Lorient. Its program? A "new modesty" the opposite of bling Sarkozy. A candidate "normal" against the excesses, transgressions of the former president but also his potential rival, DSK. "Simplicity", "sobriety", "rigor", "respect", "assembly" would be the keywords of hollandisme, more suggested qu'affirmés, as Lagerfeld had removed the Chanel logo on the buttons in the collection.

Since then, the new European leaders, whether socialist or conservative, have all adopted the "Holland-line Lagerfeld", an ethos of crisis that is perhaps a polite towards people. After the baroque excesses of Berlusconi, the feast zapateriste in Spain, the hypersarkozysme in France, karen millen sale the new trend is the look "bespectacled accountant". Balanced budget. President balanced. Monti in Italy. Rajoy in Spain. Holland in France ...

http://www.karenmillendressesmartuk.comThe dispute over tuition fees in Quebec has taken a turn for legal Friday, May 25, with the filing by the students of two litigation before the Quebec Superior Court against the special act of May 18,karen millen dresseswhich limits their view of freedom of expression and association.

"This is the biggest constitutional case in Quebec because of the number of people involved," said student leader Leo Blouin-Office before the Montreal courthouse,karen millen saleclaiming that 1.5 million Quebecers were directly affected.

A REQUEST TO BLOCK THE LAW, THE OTHER FOR CANCEL

Some 140 student organizations,karen millen outletunions and environmental and community groups and associations of artists associated with these applications to the Superior Court of Quebec, he said. Among the 14 richest countries, both have a child deprivation rate exceeds 10%: France (10.1%) and Italy (13.3%). Yet France is the country with the highest public karen millen outlet spending for children (3.7% of GDP against 2.2% for the average of the countries studied), the report said.

In contrast, over 20% of children from Romania and the United States live in relative poverty. For example, Denmark and Sweden have rates much lower deprivation than Belgium or Germany, although these four countries have similar levels of economic development and per capita income, the fund said.
